document_data.name: Slow Spout
document_data.mainbody: '''Slow Spout''' was a [[duergar|duergan]] ale that was thick and bitter. It was so named because it tended to swirl around in one's insides until it was "spouted" back up.
document_data.Availability: In [[Menzoberranzan]], it was mostly enjoyed by [[goblin]]s and [[kobold]]s, but it was not unknown for [[drow]] to drink it.
